alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Leslie; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:10PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstormd will impact portions of Harlan, Leslie and southern Perry Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1009 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms over Callaway, or 8 miles east of Pineville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm line will be near... Coldiron and Saylor around 1015 PM EDT. Wallins Creek, Kentenia, White Star, Tremont and Hensley Store around 1020 PM EDT. Harlan, Loyall, Teetersville, Grays Knob, Elcomb, Tway, Mary Alice, Sunshine, Harlan Gas and Clovertown around 1025 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Kentucky.
